dealAPI.getCustomerProducts(customerId);setProducts(customerProducts);if(customerProducts.length===0){toast.info('No pending products found for this customer that belong to you as a dealAPI.confirmOrder(selectedProductToConfirm.group_member_id);toast.success('Order confirmed
